title: Donate | Madison Arcatao Sister City Project

headings.text:
YOUR DONATION CONTINUES MADISON'S 
39 YEAR HISTORY OF SUPPORTING COMMUNITY ORGANIZING, HIGHER EDUCATION, HISTORICAL MEMORY AND SUSTAINABILITY IN ARCATAO

 ¡MUCHÍSIMAS GRACIAS!

“We want to acknowledge the 39 years of sistering between Arcatao and Madison, a tie based in commitment, solidarity and love for our people. Your support has been fundamental for growth in our community and for hope in our future”

textBlocks.html: Madison Arcatao Sister City Project

textBlocks.text:
If you would like to donate via check, please mail it to:

MASCP
P.O. Box 132
Madison, WI 53701

​

The Madison Arcatao Sister City Project is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization, and contributions are fully tax-deductible for income, gift, and estate taxes, as permitted by US tax law.

“We want to acknowledge the 39 years of sistering between Arcatao and Madison, a tie based in commitment, solidarity and love for our people. Your support has been fundamental for growth in our community and for hope in our future”

 

- Community Youth Committee in Arcatao-2025​
